QuestData.Title: Report to Engineering
QuestData.Description: $n! I need you to take all of these etherlithium crystals over to Chief Engineer Trep, my, uh, chief of engineering.$B$BHe should know what to do with them. And if he doesn't, you see to it that he finds out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Etherlithium Matrix Crystals to Chief Engineer Trep at Area 52 in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Um, hi. I'm a little busy here. What's that you have there?
QuestData.RewardText: Ooh, etherlithium matrix crystals. Yeah, those sound important!$B$BLet's just put them over here and I'll get to figuring them out in a moment.
